SCTX:
begin fab_attack_1

;creature 1 for attack

short state

if ( state == 10 )
	startcombat "guard_highord_attack"
	return
endif

if ( FabAttack == 1 )
	enable
	set state to 10
	if ( GetJournalIndex "tr_mhattack" < 10 )
		Journal "TR_MHattack" 10
	endif
else
	disable
endif

end
